title: Carrot and Roasted Red Pepper Purée

ingredients.content: 450 g carrots, cut in pieces (2-3 cm)

preparations.content: Place carrots and water in mixing bowl then cook <b>18 min/98°C/speed <b> until tender. Drain through simmering basket.

Place red peppers and cooked carrots in mixing bowl then blend <b>30 sec/speed 9<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then blend again <b>20 sec/speed 9<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add butter, mace and salt then mix <b>30 sec/speed 3<b>. Serve immediately.
